name: Space Masters
description:
Enjoy the excitement and thrill of flying thru space destroying these 8 enemy intruders who are bent on eliminating life as we know it.

This game was developed in a live stream on my discord channel for a 3 day game jam. I had thoughts of adding more depth but decided to leave as is for now.

--Discord--

https://discord.gg/hbXfpxM
